HOLDEN_COMMODORE_VT_VZ.notes: SS trim - Middle East Export (Holden Commodore VZ)

PREWAR_LUXURY.notes: Ask the Man Who Owns One

RALLY_HOMOLOGATION_FORD.notes: RS Cosworth trim - Touring Car Legend

VOLKSWAGEN_JETTA__A1___MK1_.notes: First generation, sedan version of the Golf Mk1.

VOLKSWAGEN_JETTA__A2___MK2_.notes: Larger and heavier than Mk1, very popular in North America.

VOLKSWAGEN_JETTA__A3___MK3_.notes: Dropped the 'Jetta' name in Europe (Vento) but kept it in NA.

VOLKSWAGEN_JETTA__A4___MK4_.notes: Known as Bora in many markets outside NA.

VOLKSWAGEN_JETTA__A6___MK6_.notes: Moved to a lower cost platform initially, later updated to IRS.

VOLKSWAGEN_GOLF__A1___MK1_.notes: The original Rabbit in North America.

VOLKSWAGEN_GOLF__A3___MK3_.notes: First Golf with a VR6 engine option.

VOLKSWAGEN_GOLF__A4___MK4_.notes: High quality interior, introduced the R32.

VOLKSWAGEN_GOLF__A5___MK5_.notes: Rabbit name returned briefly in NA.

VOLKSWAGEN_PASSAT__B3___MK3_.notes: First Passat with a transverse engine layout.

VOLKSWAGEN_PASSAT__B4___MK4_.notes: Heavy facelift of the B3, introduced TDI.

VOLKSWAGEN_PASSAT__B5___MK5_.notes: Shared platform with Audi A4 (longitudinal engine).

VOLKSWAGEN_PASSAT__B7___MK7_.notes: Facelift of B6; NMS version split for US market.

HONDA_ACCORD__SY_AC_AD___2ND_GEN_.notes: First Accord built in the USA.

HONDA_ACCORD__CA___3RD_GEN_.notes: Famous for pop-up headlights and double wishbone suspension.

HONDA_ACCORD__CG_CF___6TH_GEN_.notes: Distinct models for Japan, Europe, and Americas.

HONDA_CIVIC__SB_SG___1ST_GEN_.notes: The car that established Honda globally.

TOYOTA_CAMRY__XV10___3RD_GEN_.notes: Wide-body model, established Camry as a best-seller.

TOYOTA_CAMRY__XV20___4TH_GEN_.notes: Evolution of the XV10, introduced Camry Solara.

TOYOTA_CAMRY__XV50___7TH_GEN_.notes: Sharp angles, dropped the manual transmission.

TOYOTA_COROLLA__E80___5TH_GEN_.notes: Switch to FWD for sedans, AE86 remained RWD.

TOYOTA_COROLLA__E160_E170___11TH_GEN_.notes: CVT becomes standard on most trims.

TOYOTA_COROLLA__E210___12TH_GEN_.notes: TNGA platform, hatchback returns to US.

BMW_3_SERIES__E21___1ST_GEN_.notes: The original 3-Series, successor to the 02 Series.

BMW_5_SERIES__E12___1ST_GEN_.notes: First model to use the Series designation.

FORD_F_150__GEN_8___F_SERIES_.notes: Aerodynamic front end, fuel injection standard.

FORD_RANGER__PRE_1983_.notes: Ranger was a trim package on F-Series, not a standalone model.

SUBARU_FORESTER__SF___GEN_1_.notes: Tall wagon design based on Impreza.

SUBARU_FORESTER__SG___GEN_2_.notes: Refined styling, XT turbo model added.

SUBARU_FORESTER__SH___GEN_3_.notes: Moved to a crossover SUV design.

SUBARU_FORESTER__SJ___GEN_4_.notes: CVT standard on most models, X-Mode.

NISSAN_ALTIMA__L31___GEN_3_.notes: First Altima on FF-L platform, V6 option.

FORD_MODULAR_V8.notes: Spark Plug Ejector / Cam Phaser Issues

SS Turbo trim - Engine Match (LNF - Block/Head similar)
